website_summaries.verdict: A sleek-looking and stable glass whiteboard that easily wipes clean and doubles as a rolling flipchart.
pros: Multiple casters provide support and ease of transport
Easy to assemble with included hardware and the height is a breeze to adjust
Strong magnets included, as well as two steel flipchart hooks
Smaller size makes it easy to store in a corner
cons: Can only write on one side
the glass board can be more delicate that a traditional whiteboard, so breakage may occur with rough use

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, mediocre execution
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to like this--bought it for a home office where I don't want to attach a white board to the wall. The concept is great and it arrived quickly, and very well packaged. Assembly was easy, although do yourself a favor and throw away the included wrench (flimsy and useless--use either a 12 mm or 1/2 inch thin wrench). The base is not perfectly flat and the whole thing is not entirely stable--it's good enough, but still need to be careful about it tipping (a slightly wider, flat base would be better). The height adjustment is good and easy enough. Overall, not bad for the price, but could be more stable.
